name: Drug Checking Program Portal
description: Built for San Diego County, this web-based platform helps citizens easily check and track their drug test results in real-time.

name: GymScout
description: Full-stack location-based gym location app with real-time review and ratings system

name: Devsurf
description: Full-stack developer journal web-application that helps with increasing developer productivity

name: Abel
description: An innovative multi-language speech-bot designed to offer realtime voice-conversations and leveraging AI to offer fun, personalized conversational avatars.
tech-stack: Next.js, Firebase, WebSockets, ONNX, OpenAI, Whisper, VAD

name: Moon-Markers 2.0
description: A web application that allows space-enthusiasts to visualise moon-quakes on a 3D render of the moon, utilisng the official Apollo Seismic Event Catalogue.

name: SD Naloxone Website
description: Developed for a non-profit organization, this platform facilitates the distribution of Naloxone, a life-saving medication, ensuring it's readily available for individuals at risk of opioid overdose.
